text: Boy from the Outskirts () is a 1947 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasily Zhuravlyov.МАЛЬЧИК С ОКРАИНЫКто такая Майя Маркова? It stars Yevgeny Samoylov, Sergei Lukyanov, and Aleksandra Vasilyeva. == Actors == * Yevgeny Samoylov as Andrey Skvortsov * Sergei Lukyanov as father of Andrey * Aleksandra Vasilyeva as mother of Andrey * Tatiana Okunevskaya as Ira * Maya Markova as Lida * Yuri Lyubimov as Kostya Smirnov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1947 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Zhuravlyov
title: Boy from the Outskirts
